meanings.definition: The state or quality of being oily.
meanings.sent1: The oiliness of the salad dressing made it too greasy.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the oiliness of the lotion on my skin.
meanings.sent3: The oiliness of the floor made it slippery like a slide.
meanings.sent4: The oiliness of the situation was as thick as molasses.
meanings.sent5: The oiliness of the engine indicated a need for maintenance.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of containing or resembling oil.
meanings.sent1: The oiliness of the fabric made it waterproof.
meanings.sent2: The oiliness of the sauce gave it a rich flavor.
meanings.sent3: The oiliness of the paint made the walls shine like mirrors.
meanings.sent4: The oiliness of the hair product made her hair look sleek and shiny.
meanings.sent5: The oiliness of the skin after applying moisturizer felt smooth and soft.
